description: Flifo: flightplan and extended flightplan information on a flight

waypoint.description: Waypoint Formatting: for waypoints and 4d_waypoints fields

name.description: Name: Airport, navaid, waypoint, intersection, or other identifier

pitr.description: Point In Time Recovery: Timestamp value that should be supplied to the "pitr" connection initiation command when reconnecting and you wish to resume firehose playback at that approximate position

type.description: Message type: Value is always flifo

ident.description: Flight Identifier: Callsign identifying the flight. Typically, ICAO airline code plus IATA/ticketing flight number, or the aircraft registration.

id.description: FlightAware flight id: Unique identifier associated with each flight (faFlightID)

orig.description: Origin: ICAO airport code, waypoint, or latitude/longitude pair

dest.description: Destination: ICAO airport code, waypoint, or latitude/longitude pair. May be missing if not known.

status.description: Flight Status: Single letter code for current flight status, can be S Scheduled, F Filed, A Active, Z Completed, or X Cancelled.

scheduled_out.description: Scheduled Out: The scheduled out (gate departure) time (POSIX epoch format / requires extended flight info permission).

estimated_out.description: Estimated Out: The estimated out (gate departure) time (POSIX epoch format / requires extended flight info permission).

predicted_out.description: Predicted Out: The predicted out (gate departure) time, if enabled for the account (POSIX epoch format / requires predicted data and extended flight info permissions).

actual_out.description: Actual Out: The actual out (gate departure) time (POSIX epoch format / requires extended flight info permission).

scheduled_off.description: Filed Departure Time: Timestamp that was originally listed in the filed flight plan for the departure (POSIX epoch format).

estimated_off.description: Estimated Departure Time: Revised timestamp of when the flight is expected to depart (POSIX epoch format).

predicted_off.description: Predicted Off: The predicted off (runway departure) time, if enabled for the account (POSIX epoch format / requires predicted data permission).

actual_off.description: Actual Departure Time: Timestamp of when the flight actually departed (POSIX epoch format).

scheduled_on.description: Filed Arrival Time: Computed from the filed departure time and time enroute (POSIX epoch format).

estimated_on.description: Estimated Arrival Time: Time the aircraft is estimated to touch down at the airport (POSIX epoch format).

predicted_on.description: Predicted On: The predicted in (runway arrival) time, if enabled for the account (POSIX epoch format / requires predicted data permission).

actual_on.description: Actual Arrival Time: Time the aircraft touched down at the airport (POSIX epoch format).

scheduled_in.description: Scheduled In: The scheduled in (gate arrival) time. (POSIX epoch format / requires extended flight info permission).

estimated_in.description: Estimated In: The estimated in (gate arrival) time (POSIX epoch format / requires extended flight info permission).

predicted_in.description: Predicted In: The predicted in (gate arrival) time, if enabled for the account (POSIX epoch format / requires predicted data and extended flight info permissions).

actual_in.description: Actual In: The actual in (gate arrival) time (POSIX epoch format / requires extended flight info permission).

filed_ete.description: Filed En route Time: In seconds. May be missing if not known.

ete.description: En route Time: In seconds. May be missing if not known.

aircrafttype.description: Aircraft Type: FAA or ICAO aircraft type code

reg.description: Aircraft Registration: The tail number or registration of the aircraft, if known and it differs from the ident.

filed_alt.description: Filed Cruising altitude: In feet (MSL). Emitted before a flight's departure and indicates the filed cruising altitude for that flight.

cruise_alt.description: Cruising altitude: In feet (MSL). Emitted after a flight's departure and indicates the expected cruising altitude for that flight.

facility_hash.description: Reporting facility hash: A consistent and unique obfusticated identifier string for each source reporting positions to FlightAware

facility_name.description: Reporting facility name: A description of the reporting facility intended for end-user consumption. May be a blank string if undefined.

waypoints.description: Waypoints: 2D, 3D, or 4D objects of locations, times, and altitudes formatted as a JSON array

atcident.description: ATC Ident: Identifier used for ATC, if it differs from flight identifier

hexid.description: Transponder Mode S code: 24-bit Mode S transponder code assigned by aircraft registrar. Formatted in upper case hexadecimal

trueCancel.description: True Cancellation: Set to 1 when a confirmed flight cancellation was received from the airline. A value of 0 or lack of this field means that this is a presumed cancellation due to expiration or lack of data.

actual_runway_off.description: Actual Departure Runway: The runway from which the plane departed.

actual_runway_on.description: Actual Arrival Runway: The runway on which the plane landed.

scheduled_departure_gate.description: Scheduled Departure Gate: The gate from which the plane is scheduled to depart (requires extended flight info permission).

actual_departure_gate.description: Actual Departure Gate: The gate from which the plane has departed (requires extended flight info permission).

scheduled_arrival_gate.description: Scheduled Arrival Gate: The gate at which the plane is scheduled to arrive (requires extended flight info permission).

actual_arrival_gate.description: Actual Arrival Gate: The gate at which the plane has arrived (requires extended flight info permission).

scheduled_departure_terminal.description: Scheduled Departure Terminal: The terminal at which the plane is scheduled to depart (requires extended flight info permission).

actual_departure_terminal.description: Actual Departure Terminal: The terminal at which the plane has departed (requires extended flight info permission).

scheduled_arrival_terminal.description: Scheduled Arrival Terminal: The terminal at which the plane is scheduled to arrive (requires extended flight info permission).

actual_arrival_terminal.description: Actual Arrival Terminal: The terminal at which the plane has arrived (requires extended flight info permission).

baggage_claim.description: Baggage Claim: The carousel at which the baggage will or has arrived at the destination airport (requires extended flight info permission).

predicted_taxi_out_duration.description: Predicted Taxi Out Duration: In seconds. The predicted duration of taxiing out.
